title: SMC_NC_FindProgramFile (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_NC_FindProgramFile : SMC_ERROR
For a given CNC sub program name, such as âSUBâ, looks for the
corresponding CNC file âsub.cncâ in one of the subdirectories
(aSubProgramDirs).

rows.Name: strProgramName
rows.Comment: The CNC sub program name.  Case does not matter.

rows.Name: strFilePath
rows.Comment:
Out: On success, the full path of the cnc file containing the
sub program.

rows.Name: aSubProgramDirs
rows.Comment:
An array of up to 5 directories where subprograms are searched.
For a subprogram with name âSUBâ, the file âsub.cncâ (lower-case)
is searched in each of the given directories, starting with
directory aSubProgramDirs[0], in ascending order.  The first match
is used.
The first empty directory name ends the search.
